alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 9:36AM EDT until August 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac MI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan... Lower Rouge River At Dearborn affecting Wayne County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lower Rouge River At Dearborn. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 12.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Friday. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
